Track Object
Objects Reference
Track Object

A Track reflects the local recording of one individual participant, or media generated in the studio such as screenshares or sounds and videos played live using the media board.

id Unique identifier for the track.

type Type of track participant screenshare media board

status Status of the track done processing uploading stopped

files List of files available for this type of track.
